title: please god someone add me
body: I used to play league of legends with a small group of friends and my gf. I noticed one of the friends, a guy that i met in primary school and remained close with throughout the years making increasingly bold advances on my girlfriend. I ignore it thinking they're just joking around and we keep playing. Fast forward 2 months and i find out that my girlfriend cheated on me with my childhood friend bokchoy53 :/ . This fucker stole my one true love, my sweetheart and turned my only group of friends against me. Please add me uwu IGN: Patrycja. I'll catch you on the rift, summoners!

replies.body: Stole? you think she is an object? face reality buddy; She lost interest in you, grown up.
